name: Silent Gentleman
description:
STORY

Silent Gentleman is a adventure game based in a fictional German town. Player is put in the role of Uther, a young impoverished noble who resorted to stealing from the rich who pass through his town. After he tried to steal from his latest mark, a mysterious crusader named Thibaud Rodin, bad luck started following him. His friends and allies start getting killed and he feels that the noose is tightening around his neck as well. Uther, together with his best friend, young Galician traveller Oliverio must figure out what is hunting them before is too late.

GAMEPLAY

To uncover the mysterious plot sorrounding Thibaud Rodin, the player will have to sneak, negotiate and fight his way trough many plotters. In a race against time Uther still remembers his creed - never kill another human being. Failing to honor that creed will punish the player with a Game Over. The adventure is timed and failing to solve the mystery will lead Uther and Oliverio to their untimely demise...
